title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 November 2014 - XWiki
content:
<mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:14 <Chuguniy> has joined #xwiki

08:30 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:32 <silverdrop> has joined #xwiki  
09:01 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:11 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:13 <mflorea> has quit  
09:20 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:28 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
09:39 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
10:04 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
10:04 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:07 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
10:08 <lucaa> has quit  
10:09 <woshilapin> has quit  
10:12 <mflorea> ClemensR, tmortagne, gdelhumeau, vmassol: Good Morning! See my last mail on devs regarding the release. Let me know if there are any blockers and if you think it's ok to wait 2 more days for XWIKI-11176. I also need to get the status from Edy.  
10:12 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:12 <ClemensR> ah, not fully through my mail, thanks for the heads up  
10:15 <tmortagne> mflorea: the way XWIKI-10446 is described is a bit fuzzy, it's just that it require PR and you can give wiki creation right to a user that does not have PR  
10:16 <tmortagne> but it's the exact same issue with any other document that require PR  
10:16 <tmortagne> nothing really new here  
10:17 <mflorea> ok, vmassol listed some options in his last comment  
10:18 <tmortagne> I saw them but IMO the first issue which he did not listed is hat this UI require PR  
10:18 <tmortagne> which make it part of AS rewrite  
10:18 <tmortagne> actually he listed it second  
10:18 <tmortagne> did not saw it  
10:19 <tmortagne> I don't like too much the last "solution"  
10:19 <tmortagne> note that we are also talking about a wiki which is not created from a template  
10:20 <tmortagne> so this is 2 constraint that makes it not really the most common use case  
10:24 <mflorea> wikis created by a non-PR user is probably not a common use case (although you can give wiki creation right to any user, in practice the main wiki admin takes care of creating the subwikis). That doesn't mean we shouldn't fix this, but it's not critical.  
10:24 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:28 <tmortagne> yes that's what I saying and again you should not have the issue when creating the wiki from a wiki template even with a user that does not have PR  
10:29 <tmortagne> since it's supposed to copy the exact document from the template  
10:31 <ClemensR> the second solution (trying to get rid of programming rights for all XE pages) looks like lots of changes ... not sure if this can be done even in two days  
10:33 <tmortagne> ClemensR: this issue is only talking about AS, not the whole XE (even if as I said I don't see why it would be so critical for AS and not the others)  
10:34 <ClemensR> tmortagne: yes, I meant that too, it is somewhat pointless to fix it for the activity stream and leave parts of the document index broken  
10:34 <tmortagne> by the way having page requiring PR in XE always been a bug  
10:34 <tmortagne> the fact that people still don't care and continue using it when it's not justified does not make it right...  
10:36 <ClemensR> is the "no PR in XE pages" documented somewhere? I just know because I have been told I should not use it  
10:41 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
10:44 <tmortagne> there is not really any "XE rules" documentations AFAIK, the closest would be http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/ApplicationDevelopmentBestPractices  
10:44 <tmortagne> (which talk about PR)  
10:44 <tmortagne>  but it's pretty obvious that when you use PR you prevent any subwiki admin to manipulate your page/extension  
10:49 <vmassol> has quit  
10:50 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
11:08 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
12:05 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki

13:33 <gdelhumeau> apparently we have a blocker that we have missed: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11019  
13:37 <evalica> has quit  
13:45 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
13:46 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: sounds like PR issue again  
13:47 <tmortagne> and again something for which it does not make sens to require PR...  
13:53 <evalica> has quit  
14:04 <ClemensR> maybe if we want to fix that, we should dedicate a BFD for it ?  
14:10 <tmortagne> we could  
14:11 <tmortagne> a PFD :)  
14:15 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
14:16 <evalica> has quit  
14:18 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
14:51 <Enygma`> for the active contributors gadget I had to do a select at the time since I had no other way of getting that info  
14:51 <Enygma`> it probably could be refactored now.  
14:51 <Enygma`> gdelhumeau: created http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11376  
14:56 <gdelhumeau> ok thanks
